body.p:
Law and Collection Office:
No 115 South Seventh Str.
Philada 1863.
To his Excellency
The Governor of Kentucky.
Hon. Sir!
Being desirous of the appointment of Commissioners for the State of Kentucky, we would respectfully solicit that favor of you..

We refer you to the recommendations of the prominent and respectable, citizens, whose names are hereto annexed. Upon the appointment being made known to us, we shall remit to you, whatever fee is required for the same.

Very respy yrs,
C. T. Foulks
H. A. Pfeiffer }
Attys at law.

We, the undersigned citizens of Philadelphia, have known Messrs. Foulks and Pfeiffer for a long period; they, are gentlemen of ability and integrity; and we cheerfully recommend them as deserving the appointment solicited.
